name: Facebook Rounded Profile Pictures
description:
This is just a simple CSS trick to round every profile picture, making them more interesting.

26/01/2015 UPDATE:
Now it makes every profile picture, even in chatboxes rounded. Also remove some annoying borders making them more flat looking.

user.name: Lucas Rafael Barboza
